LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShieldUnmanned: Can only be reconfigured when a defense network console is manned or a compatible AI is connected.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShieldInterceptDire: Intercept direct-fire projectiles such as arrows, bullets, grenades, and anti-tank rockets.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShieldInterceptOver: Intercept indirect-fire projectiles such as mortar rounds, artillery shells, and artillery rockets.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShieldInterceptExpl: Intercept explosive projectiles such as grenades, rockets, and incendiary bolts.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShieldInterceptNonE: Intercept non-explosive projectiles such as arrows, bullets, fragmentation, and other kinetic rounds.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShieldInterceptEner: Sets the minimum energy reserve this generator will intercept projectiles at. Below this threshold, this generator will allow projectiles through.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShieldRadiusDesc: Adjust the interception radius of this projector.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShieldInterceptTogg: Click to enable or disable for all generators
